name: deterministic-agent-system
description: Deterministic agent system with auditable and replayable execution

scripts.test:http: node tests/http.execute.test.js && node tests/http.negative.test.js && node tests/http.simulate.test.js && node tests/http.simulate-model.test.js && node tests/http.health-and-requestid.test.js && node tests/http.tool-execute.test.js
scripts.verify: npm run verify:bootstrap && npm run verify:contracts
scripts.test: node tests/core.bounded-loop.test.js && node tests/agent.executor.test.js && node tests/agent.replay.e2e.test.js && node tests/agent.determinism.snapshot.test.js && node tests/tool.executor.test.js && node tests/http.execute.test.js && node tests/http.negative.test.js && node tests/http.simulate.test.js && node tests/http.simulate-model.test.js && node tests/http.health-and-requestid.test.js && node tests/http.tool-execute.test.js && node tests/openai-compatible.adapter.test.js
